AM9meWiUGcM4F01Bvg87Yw.text: Great juice and smoothies. Really nice staff. Love this place and I'm not even a vegan. The cakes are really nice too.

lKUr_fcEuQNRPSPMJx5LFQ.text: Have passed by this unassuming cafe so many times and finally got around to popping in. Great selection of organic teas and some groceries too.  Friend had their organic earl grey and we both have freshly made fruit smoothies.  I'd definitely go back for another. Didn't have food but whatever they were cooking smelled great. Sadly though the open kitchen meant I came away smelling of food too though for the rest of the day.

photos.caption: Photo of Organic Delicious Cafe - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

6isFgai2qK8kLPLAx_-wmw.text: I have to knock one star of this wonderful cafe simply because it isn't as cheap as I'd first thought. The guy who served me on my first visit must have been feeling particularly generous or he was new. - He gave me more salad for a much cheaper price.   I've now learnt that the salad prices are similar to anywhere else in the area. - I'll still visit just not as often as I'd like!
